name: Canada EU Trade and Investment Association
goal:
CEUTIA is the first cross-sector industry association established in Brussels which is focused exclusively on advancing and promoting Canadian and EU trade and investment interests.
​
CEUTIA aims to promote a growth-orientated business and investment climate for Canadian and European businesses from small to larger organisations.
​
CEUTIA promotes CETA and ensure business and interested parties reap its benefits.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Canada EU Trade Agreement ; Strategic Partnership Agreement between EU and Canada ; Investment protection and all transatlantic issues ; Trade negotiations negotiations with third countries
